programme.title: The Night Sitter
programme.desc: Seorang penipu menyamar sebagai pengasuh kanak-kanak untuk merompak rumah seorang ahli ghaib yang kaya dan anak lelakinya yang masih kecil. Tetapi apabila rakan sejenayahnya tiba, budak lelaki itu memanggil trio ahli sihir yang melayan penjahat itu ke malam kekacauan.

programme.title: UC 2
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri yang bahagia mula mengalami mimpi ngeri di rumah mereka apabila perbuatan ghaib dan misteri mula berlaku.

programme.title: Taxi 5
programme.desc: Seorang pegawai polis yang ditukarkan dalam polis Marseilles ditugaskan untuk menumpaskan sekumpulan perompak Itali yang memandu Ferrari berkuasa bersama anak saudara Daniel yang lebih tua, seorang pemandu yang teruk yang mendapat teksi putih legenda.

programme.title: The Invoking 5
programme.desc: Dalam bab terbaru francais seram yang menyeramkan, The Invoking 5: phantoms, peristiwa paranormal dirakam di seluruh dunia dalam apa yang mungkin menjadi skala terbesar yang pernah direkodkan dalam sejarah manusia.

programme.title: Double Barrel
programme.desc: Mengenai pasangan muda yang miskin bekerja sebagai pembunuh upahan sehingga mereka diberi tugasan terbaru untuk menghapuskan abang isteri sendiri yang memaksa mereka lari dan bersembunyi daripada kumpulan itu untuk menyelamatkan diri dan bayi mereka.

programme.title: Face Off: Studios
programme.desc: Trung dan abangnya adalah stuntman filem profesional. Untuk mengumpul wang bagi pengarah filem menyiapkan penerbitan filem mereka, adik-beradik itu membantu bos triad untuk menyeludup barangan haram sebagai pertukaran untuk pelaburannya dalam filem itu. Walau bagaimanapun, mereka tidak lama lagi mendapati bahawa mereka telah jatuh ke dalam perangkap.

programme.title: Dendam Sarakit Ep 10 Ep10
programme.desc: Dina pergi berjumpa bomoh Siam untuk dipulihkan dari dikawal oleh jin Sarakit tetapi bomoh itu tidak dapat membantu. Kesihatan Mariam pula semakin teruk kerana sering diganggu lembaga perempuan sehingga abangnya, Sidek, membawa Ustaz Hambali untuk mengubat Mariam. Sidek telah meminta Rafiq pulang melihat ibunya yang sakit tetapi Rafiq tidak pulang kerana memikirkan keadaan Sarakit yang sarat mengandung. Jali pula sering diganggu hantu tenggek dan perkara ini diceritakan kepada Gato, tetapi Gato tidak mempercayai Jali. Pada satu hari, Jali dijumpai mati dalam keadaan aneh tercacak di batang kayu yang tajam. Kini, giliran Gato pula diganggu dan pada satu pagi, Gato dijumpai Pak Bado tertidur di belukar

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: Sekumpulan bekas tentera upahan bersatu semula untuk merancang rompakan epik: meningkatkan trak penuh ubat yang dipegang oleh agensi perisikan asing untuk membekalkan kem pelarian yang memerlukan. Tetapi apabila mereka mendapati trak itu benar-benar dipenuhi dengan emas yang dicuri, kumpulan saudara-saudara itu menyedari bahawa mereka telah diserang dua kali oleh salah seorang daripada mereka sendiri - dan meletakkan keadaan yang betul akan menjadi perang habis-habisan.

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Datuk Pangeran Abdul Rahman, waris-warisnya dipanggil untuk mendengar wasiat yang ditulisnya. Harta peninggalannya sebanyak RM30 juta akan dibahagikan kepada Azlee, Mazlan, Saiful serta isteri mudanya, Ratana Putri, seorang wanita Thailand. Azlee tidak puas hati sebab tak mahu berkongsi harta dengan pewaris lain. Lalu berlakulah pertengkaran kecil antara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Puri. Peguam arwah Datuk Pangeran menjelaskan terdapat syarat untuk memiliki harta tersebut, iaitu kesemua waris-waris diminta untuk menetap di banglo besar itu selama 33 hari. Dalam ketegangan yangg berlaku diantara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Putri, tiba-tiba mereka dikejutkan dengan kehadiran pontianak di banglo tersebut.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka Puaka X gemar pergi ke beberapa tempat yang dikatakan berhantu. Mereka menggunakan pendekatan berbeza daripada kumpulan paranormal yang lain. Semakin hari, Puaka X semakin galak mencabar sesiapa di luar sana untuk membuktikan kewujudan hantu. Pada suatu hari mereka menerima cabaran daripada seseorang yang tidak dikenali untuk pergi ke lokasi bernama Balai Gombak. Tanpa disedari, ada sesuatu yang menanti mereka di sana.

programme.title: Perjanjian Syaitan
programme.desc: Tambun membunuh Tok Kadim, penghulu di sebuah kampung dan kemudiannya mengatakan bahawa Tok Kadim mati satu kemalangan. Selepas kejadian itu, Tambun dilantik menjadi ketua kampung yang baharu. Pada masa yang sama, Ribut, adik kepada Tambun yang berwajah hodoh ingin membalas dendam kepada Ujang kerana menolak cintanya dan memilih Seri sebagai teman. Ribut bersahabat dengan syaitan yang berjanji untuk menjadikannya seorang perempuan cantik. Sejak itulah Ribut berusaha untuk membalas dendam sehingga berlaku beberapa siri kematian yang penuh misteri.

programme.title: Jin Notti
programme.desc: Segala yang berlaku dalam dunia jin akan bertentangan dengan alam manusia. Notti, seekor anak jin dihukum kerana sering membuat keburukan dalam dunianya. Hukuman yang dijatuhkan kepadanya ialah dia perlu turun ke bumi dan untuk bergaul dengan orang-orang jahat. Ketika berada di bumi, Notti perlu masuk ke dalam tubuh manusia dan membuat kejahatan namun dia sering gagal. Lebih merumitkan keadaan, Notti mula jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki bernama Aziz.

programme.title: 2 Alam
programme.desc: Amy(Adam) melanjutkan pengajiannya di London. Semasa berada di sana, dia terpengaruh dengan budaya barat. Dia sanggup membuat pembedahan menukar jantina dan berkahwin dengan seorang lelaki Inggeris. Sekian lama membuat dosa, Amy(Adam) akhirnya nekad untuk mengambil nyawanya sendiri. Perjalanan terakhir Adam menuju liang lahad menjadi sukar dengan kejadian pelbagai peristiwa aneh.

programme.title: Duhai Si Pari Pari
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Syadon, seorang pemuda yang mencintai Mala. Pada suatu hari, Syadon bertemu seorang gadis bernama Pari yang sedang mencari kekasihnya. Semakin hari, Pari semakin suntuk waktu yang Pari ada untuk mengahwini jejaka idamannya dan pulang ke dunia kayangan. Syadon bertanya siapakah Pari yang sebenarnya dan setelah diterangkan, dia sukar mempercayainya. Pari terpaksa membuktikan kata-katanya dengan menunaikan permintaan Syadon.

programme.title: Seru
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sebuah produksi yang sedang membuat satu penggambaran filem seram bertajuk "Jangan Bernafas". Semasa penggambaran berlangsung, secara tiba-tiba, pelbagai kejadian aneh dan peristiwa berlaku, diluar jangkaan mereka. Pada mulanya, mereka menganggap ia hanyalah rasukan biasa dan kru di sebalik pembikinan filem tersebut, ingin menjadikannya sebagai "footage" menarik untuk tujuan promosi filem tersebut. Namun, seorang demi seorang menjadi sasaran rasukan dan juga pembunuhan, menyebabkan keadaan menjadi tidak terkawal... tetapi kamera yang digunakan, masih terus merakamkan aksi yang terjadi.

programme.title: Anita Dunia Ajaib
programme.desc: Rumahtangga Amir dan Asmah berubah setelah mereka didatangi seorang pembantu rumah misteri yang membantu mendapatkan mereka cahaya mata. Selepas melahirkan anak dalam tempoh yang singkat, satu demi satu insiden aneh menimpa ahli keluarga dan kenalan mereka.

programme.title: Perjanjian Syaitan
programme.desc: Tambun membunuh Tok Kadim, penghulu di sebuah kampung dan kemudiannya mengatakan bahawa Tok Kadim mati satu kemalangan. Selepas kejadian itu, Tambun dilantik menjadi ketua kampung yang baharu. Pada masa yang sama, Ribut, adik kepada Tambun yang berwajah hodoh ingin membalas dendam kepada Ujang kerana menolak cintanya dan memilih Seri sebagai teman. Ribut bersahabat dengan syaitan yang berjanji untuk menjadikannya seorang perempuan cantik. Sejak itulah Ribut berusaha untuk membalas dendam sehingga berlaku beberapa siri kematian yang penuh misteri.

programme.title: Ular
programme.desc: Myra ialah seorang wartawan jenayah yang digantung kerja telah diarahkan untuk membuat liputan di sebuah pusat peranginan di sebuah pulau. Dia yang ditemani jurukameranya, Remy tidak pernah menyangka tugasannya kali ini bukanlah satu tugasan biasa apabila percutian hebat yang dimenangi oleh 10 orang pemenang cabutan bertuah bertukar menjadi sebuah mimpi ngeri. Segalanya bermula apabila ada di antara tetamu pusat peranginan itu dengan beraninya telah menyelinap masuk ke dalam hutan yang telah dipagari dengan pagar elektrik. Rambo yang panik setelah menyedari hal tersebut segera mendapatkan Encik Aziz, pemilik pusat peranginan tersebut. Ia secara tidak langsung telah menimbulkan rasa ingin tahu Myra dan Remy untuk merungkai apakah rahsia yang cuba disembunyikan oleh Encik Aziz di sebalik kewujudan pusat peranginan tersebut.

programme.title: Brainscan: Aku Dan Topi Ajaib
programme.desc: Adruce, seorang budak yang kuat berangan dan sering tidur dalam kelas. Pada suatu hari, Adruce membawa pulang sebuah alat berbentuk topi yang dijumpainya di dalam semak. Tanpa pengetahun Adruce, alat itu adalah sebuah mesin yang boleh membaca fikiran manusia yang dicuri daripada makmal Dr. Suzana. Pelbagai kejadian berlaku selepas Adruce memakai topi itu sehingga dia perlu membetulkan semula keadaan yang telah berubah.

programme.title: Anak Niat
programme.desc: Juita dipanggil anak niat yang ditatah penuh kasih sayang oleh ibu dan bapanya, Orang Kaya dan Faridah. Ibu dan bapa Juita bernazar kepada Keramat untuk mendapatkan seorang anak iaitu Juita namun tidak mahu menerima kenyataan bahawa perbuatan itu adalah syirik. Juita kemudian menjalinkan hubungan bersama Jidot. Abang Mat pula sedih kerana sering dipandang hina oleh Orang Kaya dan Juita hanya kerana dia seorang pembantu yang diupah oleh mereka. Kebenaran terbongkar apabila Abang Mat ialah bapa kepada Jidot dan juga Juita.

programme.title: Magika
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua beradik, Ayu dan Malik yang tersesat di alam bunian selepas keluar rumah pada waktu maghrib. Ayu berhadapan dengan ujian sukar untuk menyelamatkan adiknya Malik yang diculik nenek kebayan. Walau bagaimanapun, Ayu bernasib baik kerana dia bertemu dengan Badang yang membantu menyelamatkan mereka keluar dari dunia asing itu.

programme.title: Duhai Si Pari Pari
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Syadon, seorang pemuda yang mencintai Mala. Pada suatu hari, Syadon bertemu seorang gadis bernama Pari yang sedang mencari kekasihnya. Semakin hari, Pari semakin suntuk waktu yang Pari ada untuk mengahwini jejaka idamannya dan pulang ke dunia kayangan. Syadon bertanya siapakah Pari yang sebenarnya dan setelah diterangkan, dia sukar mempercayainya. Pari terpaksa membuktikan kata-katanya dengan menunaikan permintaan Syadon.

programme.title: Seru
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sebuah produksi yang sedang membuat satu penggambaran filem seram bertajuk "Jangan Bernafas". Semasa penggambaran berlangsung, secara tiba-tiba, pelbagai kejadian aneh dan peristiwa berlaku, diluar jangkaan mereka. Pada mulanya, mereka menganggap ia hanyalah rasukan biasa dan kru di sebalik pembikinan filem tersebut, ingin menjadikannya sebagai "footage" menarik untuk tujuan promosi filem tersebut. Namun, seorang demi seorang menjadi sasaran rasukan dan juga pembunuhan, menyebabkan keadaan menjadi tidak terkawal... tetapi kamera yang digunakan, masih terus merakamkan aksi yang terjadi.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka Puaka X gemar pergi ke beberapa tempat yang dikatakan berhantu. Mereka menggunakan pendekatan berbeza daripada kumpulan paranormal yang lain. Semakin hari, Puaka X semakin galak mencabar sesiapa di luar sana untuk membuktikan kewujudan hantu. Pada suatu hari mereka menerima cabaran daripada seseorang yang tidak dikenali untuk pergi ke lokasi bernama Balai Gombak. Tanpa disedari, ada sesuatu yang menanti mereka di sana.

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Datuk Pangeran Abdul Rahman, waris-warisnya dipanggil untuk mendengar wasiat yang ditulisnya. Harta peninggalannya sebanyak RM30 juta akan dibahagikan kepada Azlee, Mazlan, Saiful serta isteri mudanya, Ratana Putri, seorang wanita Thailand. Azlee tidak puas hati sebab tak mahu berkongsi harta dengan pewaris lain. Lalu berlakulah pertengkaran kecil antara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Puri. Peguam arwah Datuk Pangeran menjelaskan terdapat syarat untuk memiliki harta tersebut, iaitu kesemua waris-waris diminta untuk menetap di banglo besar itu selama 33 hari. Dalam ketegangan yangg berlaku diantara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Putri, tiba-tiba mereka dikejutkan dengan kehadiran pontianak di banglo tersebut.

programme.title: Jin Notti
programme.desc: Segala yang berlaku dalam dunia jin akan bertentangan dengan alam manusia. Notti, seekor anak jin dihukum kerana sering membuat keburukan dalam dunianya. Hukuman yang dijatuhkan kepadanya ialah dia perlu turun ke bumi dan untuk bergaul dengan orang-orang jahat. Ketika berada di bumi, Notti perlu masuk ke dalam tubuh manusia dan membuat kejahatan namun dia sering gagal. Lebih merumitkan keadaan, Notti mula jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki bernama Aziz.

programme.title: 2 Alam
programme.desc: Amy(Adam) melanjutkan pengajiannya di London. Semasa berada di sana, dia terpengaruh dengan budaya barat. Dia sanggup membuat pembedahan menukar jantina dan berkahwin dengan seorang lelaki Inggeris. Sekian lama membuat dosa, Amy(Adam) akhirnya nekad untuk mengambil nyawanya sendiri. Perjalanan terakhir Adam menuju liang lahad menjadi sukar dengan kejadian pelbagai peristiwa aneh.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak

programme.title: Anita Dunia Ajaib
programme.desc: Rumahtangga Amir dan Asmah berubah setelah mereka didatangi seorang pembantu rumah misteri yang membantu mendapatkan mereka cahaya mata. Selepas melahirkan anak dalam tempoh yang singkat, satu demi satu insiden aneh menimpa ahli keluarga dan kenalan mereka.

programme.desc: Meneroka budaya & warisan tempatan, juga mengimbau kembali kenangan zaman penjajahan dahulu serta kesannya terhadap jati diri bangsa.

programme.title: Life, Recycled Ep4
programme.desc: A program to encourage everyone in our community to recycle and responsibly sort waste. This program will show the entire recycling and upcycling process of plastic, paper, cooking oil, and etc.

programme.title: Halik Ep66
programme.desc: Childhood lovers Jacky and Lino meet after being apart for several years. However, now married to different people, the two must choose whether to fight to be together again or be true to the promise made to their spouses.

programme.title: Jom Camping Ep8
programme.desc: Program travelog yang meneroka pelbagai bentuk dan jenis perkhemahan berbeza selain berjalan ke lokasilokasi perkhemahan di negeri Sarawak bersama dua anak jati Sarawak, El Baharin dan Anaz Zawawi.

programme.title: Food Truck Road Trip Ep8
programme.desc: Watch the adventures of two friends, Azree & Kojak, on a journey in their Food Trucks as they drive from Miri to Kuching, making stops along the way. The duo cook dishes using locally sourced ingredients, and have misadventures as they discover new places while selling great food.

programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Kunci Galaksi Ep5
programme.desc: A group of historians and scientists have predicted that a great artifact from another world will appear at a certain time and location. Many people believed it to be a myth and a fairy tale.

programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Sukan TVS Ep8
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan, perbincangan dan topik hangat sukan tanah air

programme.title: Rezeki Tanah Ep1
programme.desc: TVS mempersembahkan siri dokumentari Rezeki Tanah yang mengisahkan kecekalan 13 orang insan yang sanggup berkotor dan merisikokan diri untuk mencari rezeki, tidak kira daripada hasil hutan mahupun cucuk tanam demi kelangsungan hidup dan keluarga tercinta.

programme.title: (L) Berita Iban TVS
programme.desc: Berita Iban memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Iban

programme.title: Bario Permata Di Pergunungan Ep2
programme.desc: Pengenalan kepada bario-tanah tinggi kelabit. Kedudukannya dalam peta sarawak. Kemudahan perjalanan darat dan udara. Panorama gunung-ganang, cuaca yang nyaman (bario disebut bariew) bermaksud angin.

programme.title: (DL) Menarik Sepuluh
programme.desc: Menarik Sepuluh mengumpulkan 10 kisah unik dan menarik berlaku di mana sahaja

programme.title: (L) UTAMA
programme.desc: UTAMA merupakan segmen berita utama yang memaparkan Berita Terkini di seluruh Malaysia dan dunia.

programme.title: (L) Padah Jenayah
programme.desc: Padah Jenayah memaparkan ketangkasan pasukan keselamatan negara mengendalikan operasi,serbuan,tangkapan serta tugas-tugas menyelamat.

programme.title: Kenyalang Badminton Talent Ep4
programme.desc: Dengan aspirasi dan inisiatif ini, kami amat berharap untuk mencari bakat-bakat pemain baru Badminton Sarawak seterusnya meningkatkan pembangunan dan perkembangan sukan Badminton di Sarawak

programme.title: Borneo Wildlife & Nature Ep2
programme.desc: Breathtaking documentary that uncovers the extraordinary world of wildlife and nature, taking audiences on an unparalleled journey through one of the world's most diverse and fascinating ecosystems.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches Ep6
programme.desc: Diana Bishop, a historian and witch, forms an uneasy alliance with Matthew Clairmont, an enigmatic vampire, to decipher a manuscript containing magical secrets.

programme.title: (L) TVS Nightline
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan peristiwa yang berlaku di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa English

programme.title: Agritek S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Setiap episode 1 atau 2 orang usahawan dari bumi kenyalang akan membawa penonton untuk melawat ke tapak tempat mereka melakukan pengusahaan agriculture.

programme.title: Misteri Kedai Gunting Ep5
programme.desc: Kisah misteri yang dihantar oleh individu yang pernah mengalami peristiwa seram dan diceritakan semula oleh pencerita di dalam sebuah kedai gunting.

programme.title: Nature XCO & Downhill Ep12
programme.desc: Program pertandingan sukan basikal lasak yang dianjurkan oleh Broad Vision Solution Sdn.Bhd dengan kerjasama Persatuan Basikal Sarawak dan Sarawak Sports Cooperation bersama Kerajaan Negeri Sarawak.

programme.title: Suara Alam Borneo Ep10
programme.desc: Suara Alam Borneo akan mengupasnya hutan hujan tropika berusia jutaan tahun secara terperinci dengan pelbagai spesis flora dan juga fauna menerusi informasi yang mudah difahami.

programme.title: Borneo's Unique Building Ep7
programme.desc: Siri dokumentari yang memfokuskan kepada senibina bangunan dan infrastruktur di Sarawak, yang menampilkan dua binaan iaitu satu senibina moden/kontemporari dan satu lagi senibina tradisi/kolonial.

programme.title: Kedey Kita S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Orden Syam will use a food truck to visit local entrepreneurs outside Kuching city, such as Sibu, Sarikei, Sri Aman, Kapit, and Betong, helping them promote their businesses and offer exclusive promotions.

programme.title: The Cloth Story S2 Ep11
programme.desc: The Cloth Story season 2 focuses on textiles, such as Pua, Songket, Tenun, Batik and Keringkam from the Borneo region. The cloth, the raw materials, the artisans, the history, the evolution and so much more.

programme.title: Past, Present & Future Ep4
programme.desc: Hidden throughout Sarawak are unsung heroes who are striving to preserve, share and expand local arts, customs and lifestyles to the world

programme.title: The Last Highlanders Of Borneo Ep1
programme.desc: Travel series presented by Hiker and Explorer, Ian Vong across two remote regions of northeast of Sarawak, namely Bario and Ba'kelalan. and closely following the indigenous tribes of the Orang-Ulu, particularly the Kelabit and Lun Bawang people.

programme.title: Jom Camping Ep8
programme.desc: Program travelog yang meneroka pelbagai bentuk dan jenis perkhemahan berbeza selain berjalan ke lokasilokasi perkhemahan di negeri Sarawak bersama dua anak jati Sarawak, El Baharin dan Anaz Zawawi.

programme.title: Ram Ram Rep Ep2
programme.desc: A famous high school in Sarawak organises a reunion for the class of 1993. A mixed-up in the mailing of the invitations, leads to the attendance of only six ex-students.

programme.title: Take Me To Sarawak Ep2
programme.desc: This travelogue aims to take viewers, both locals and tourists, to places that you may not have heard of, but definitely have to see, experience and taste

programme.desc: Kehidupan penduduk yang tinggal di sepanjang sungai Rajang, Sarawak. Kedudukan geografinya yang strategik menjadikan sungai ini sebagai sumber ekonomi, pendidikan, perhubungan dan produk pelancongan

programme.title: Gawai Bidayuh Ep5
programme.desc: A documentary series exploring the Bidayuh's Gawai Festivals in KUCHING & SERIAN regions, aims to uncover the true meaning of Gawai across borders, revealing the deeper significance of Bidayuh Gawai.

programme.title: Anak Penjual Ikan Asin Sukses Jadi Pengusaha Kapal
programme.desc: Kehilangan bapanya pada usia muda, Arief terpaksa membantu ibunya menjual ikan masin untuk mencari nafkah. Perjuangan Arief berbuah hasil, kerana di masa depan beliau berjaya menjadi usahawan kapal yang berjaya seperti arwah ayahnya.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep76
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: Konser Raya 29 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Pertama Ep2
programme.desc: Konser Raya 29 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Pertama adalah konsert besar yang menandakan ulang tahun ke-29 Indosiar, stesen televisyen Indonesia yang terkenal. Acara ini berlangsung selama dua malam. Konsert ini adalah paparan hebat bakat Indonesia, dengan persembahan dari pelbagai artis dari pelbagai genre. Acara ini dianjurkan oleh sembilan hos popular dalam industri hiburan Indonesia. Konsert ini bukan sahaja sambutan perjalanan dan pencapaian Indosiar selama hampir tiga dekad, tetapi juga mempamerkan kepelbagaian dan kekayaan budaya Indonesia.

programme.title: Melukis Senja Ep14
programme.desc: Senja, seorang gadis yang baru sahaja memasuki sekolah barunya. Dia merupakan seorang pemain ice skating yang mahir. Namun, malangnya, suatu hari dia kalah dalam sebuah pertandingan kerana melihat sebuah anak patung Teddy Bear, yang menyebabkan dia trauma. Masa kanak-kanak Senja, di mana adiknya tenggelam dengan anak patung Teddy Bear kesayangannya, telah menyebabkan trauma padanya hingga kini. Senja akhirnya dibawa ke pakar psikiatri.

programme.title: Guru Desa Pengrajin Sapu Lidi Yang Ingin Memajukan Desa
programme.desc: Semasa sedang mengajar, kelas Ratna tiba-tiba diusir kerana tidak membayar sewa. Semua peralatan rosak, dan Ratna cuba membeli yang baru tetapi tidak mempunyai wang yang mencukupi. Zaki datang dan meminjamkan wang kepadanya. Zaki mencadangkan agar Ratna mula menjual penyapu lidi.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep182
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep30
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: Melukis Senja Ep14
programme.desc: Senja, seorang gadis yang baru sahaja memasuki sekolah barunya. Dia merupakan seorang pemain ice skating yang mahir. Namun, malangnya, suatu hari dia kalah dalam sebuah pertandingan kerana melihat sebuah anak patung Teddy Bear, yang menyebabkan dia trauma. Masa kanak-kanak Senja, di mana adiknya tenggelam dengan anak patung Teddy Bear kesayangannya, telah menyebabkan trauma padanya hingga kini. Senja akhirnya dibawa ke pakar psikiatri.

programme.title: Guru Desa Pengrajin Sapu Lidi Yang Ingin Memajukan Desa
programme.desc: Semasa sedang mengajar, kelas Ratna tiba-tiba diusir kerana tidak membayar sewa. Semua peralatan rosak, dan Ratna cuba membeli yang baru tetapi tidak mempunyai wang yang mencukupi. Zaki datang dan meminjamkan wang kepadanya. Zaki mencadangkan agar Ratna mula menjual penyapu lidi.

programme.title: Aku Istri Yang Berkorban Demi Masa Depan Anakku
programme.desc: Kehidupan Meli sangatlah berat terutama setelah kehidupan rumah tangganya dihancurkan oleh suaminya sendiri. Sebagai seorang istri dan ibu, Meli sangatlah terluka dan kecewa apabila ia dikhianati oleh suaminya. Arga seolah-olah hanya menggunakan Meli sebagai alat untuk memperoleh wang sementara dia sendiri menikah dengan pengasuh anaknya. Meli juga harus berjuang untuk memenangi semula kasih sayang anaknya yang telah dipaksa membencinya oleh Arga dan Ayu. Apakah yang sebenarnya berlaku?

programme.title: Janji Palsu Suamiku, Derita Buatku
programme.desc: Tomy melamar Alda dan menjanjikan akan merawat kebutuhan ibu dan adik calon istrinya. Setelah pernikahan, usaha Tomy mengalami penurunan dan ibunya menyalahkan Alda karena miskin dan tidak bisa membantu suaminya. Ketika usahanya mulai membaik, Tomy berselingkuh dengan mitra bisnisnya. Akankah Alda mampu menerima kenyataan ini?

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep35
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep33
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep34

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep182
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Mau Mendua Tapi Takut FYP!

programme.desc: Konser Raya 29 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa Puncak Kedua adalah konsert besar yang menandakan ulang tahun ke-29 Indosiar, stesen televisyen Indonesia yang terkenal. programme.title: Anak Penjual Ikan Asin Sukses Jadi Pengusaha Kapal
programme.desc: Kehilangan bapanya pada usia muda, Arief terpaksa membantu ibunya menjual ikan masin untuk mencari nafkah. Perjuangan Arief berbuah hasil, kerana di masa depan beliau berjaya menjadi usahawan kapal yang berjaya seperti arwah ayahnya.

programme.desc: Retta mengalami kemalangan, jatuh ke dalam kolam renang dan tenggelam. Rio, yang menyaksikan kejadian tersebut, segera membantu. Rio lalu berjaya menyelamatkan nyawa Retta. Apabila ibu Retta mengetahui hal ini, beliau segera menjodohkan Rio dan Retta serta mengatur agar mereka berdua segera menikah.

programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: I (2021)
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: My Lovely Angel
programme.desc: A man bears the responsibility to take care of a deaf-blind girl unexpectedly, which turns out to be life-changing to both of them.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: Race To Freedom: Um Bok Dong
programme.desc: Um Bok-dong, a cyclist who won a match during the Japanese colonial era, alerts the colonial authorities and galvanizes the locals, especially freedom fighters who have invested in the races.

programme.title: Gate
programme.desc: A group of five conspired for one last heist, yet secrets inside the vault are large enough to overthrow the country.

programme.title: Extreme Job
programme.desc: An ill-performed narcotics team takeover a fried chicken joint near the drug gang's safe house for around-the-clock surveillance. Yet their cooking talent turned the restaurant famous overnight...

programme.title: Killing Romance
programme.desc: As a popular actress has growing discontentment towards her marriage, she begins planning to kill her rich husband with her neighbor.

programme.title: For The Emperor
programme.desc: Former baseball player involved in fixing game was recruited to work for private loan company. He also falls for bar owner Yeon-Soo, and slowly unleashes his endless desire and ambition...

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: I Am The King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: An aspiring news anchor and a struggling wrestler meets by chance at a burger joint. Through shared meals, they encourage each other to reach for their dreams!

programme.title: Perfect Game
programme.desc: On May 16, 1987, Korea's two greatest pitchers of the day, face off to determine who is the better pitcher, in an epic game that would go down in baseball history.

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food, and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: Guimoon: The Lightless Door
programme.desc: As exorcist Do-jin heads over to an abandoned community center with rumors of strange deaths, he met 3 college students there to capture the rumored events and realised they're trapped

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods
programme.desc: In a rural town in 1982, a tough young girl secretly has a crush on a playboy. When a transfer student arrives, the playboy falls in love with her causing unexpected chaos at school.

programme.title: The Tenor - Lirico Spinto
programme.desc: A strong partnership and friendship begins when a talented Korean vocalist met a Japanese music producer. At the peak of his career, he was diagnosed with thyroid cancer and might loss his voice...

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: Our Season
programme.desc: Bok-Ja passed away. She receives a vacation from heaven and can be back to earth for 3 days. Bok-Ja looks after her daughter Jin-Joo, who can feel Bok-Ja is hovering around her.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Hot Blooded
programme.desc: A small and quiet port in Busan outskirt became the battlefield of local gangsters.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: Killing Romance
programme.desc: As a popular actress has growing discontentment towards her marriage, she begins planning to kill her rich husband with her neighbor.

programme.title: Search Out
programme.desc: When a social media influencer finds traces of cyberbullying that led to his neighbor's suicide, he teams up with his friend to untangle the mystery behind the deadly game.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Cadaver
programme.desc: 6 med students participate in their first anatomy class, yet nightmare begins when they are assigned with a deadly beautiful cadaver.

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep75
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3834
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. programme.title: Player In Kaohsiung (M) Ep60
programme.desc: The name Kaohsiung has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from Da Gou. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiungs [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly. The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiungs century-old history.

programme.title: Walker Fun Kaohsiung (M) Ep211
programme.desc: Walker Fun Kaohsiung is a travel reality show that takes viewers on an exciting journey through the vibrant city of Kaohsiung. With 35 different routes, the show explores the citys hidden gems, local culture, and unique experiences. From bustling night markets to serene temples, Walker Fun Kaohsiung showcases the best of Kaohsiung.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep14
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep295296
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep502
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: My Hero, My Daddy (M) Ep2223
programme.desc: A fathers love for his daughters landed Jinfa Huang in battles against other men right within his family, as he found himself in conflict with his sons-in-law. His 3 daughters each possessed a distinct personality but were similarly headstrong and in romantic relationships that caused their fathers brows to crease. Tianlan, his eldest, was in love with Minglu Xu, Jinfas superior who never missed an opportunity to make life difficult for him; Tianhong, his second daughter, was drifting apart from him because of her husband; meanwhile, his youngest girl was challenging the taboo of a campus romance. How would Jinfa emerge victor in this fight to protect the 3 loves of his life?

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep57
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep946947
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep727
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep503
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep4344
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: Based on the 1993 true event of the "China-Russia Train Robbery", a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face lifes mounting hardships.

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: Monkey King is tasked with escorting Monk Tang on his journey to the West to retrieve the scriptures. During the trip, Monk Tang is being targeted by the seductive yet deadly White Bone Spirit, who feeds on the innocents to gain immortality. Monkey King will have to fight the White Bone Spirit in order to save Monk Tang!

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu has been waiting for her first love for 10 years but he marries someone else in the end. As she loses faith in love, she meets a wedding planner and a handsome and rich man, who both help her get over her ex-boyfriend. As Chu Chu feels the same love from them, she must make up her mind. Who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Trending Topic
programme.desc: Chen Miao, an online media editor-in-chief, wrote a popular article which has become a trending topic. This however, led indirectly to a girls suicide. After receiving a help request, she realises that there is more to the story than meets the eye. As public opinion sways on the case, a war to speak up for the weak has begun!

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: Hero Among Heroes
programme.desc: Wong Fei Hung assists Lin Ze Xu to crack down the opium trading in Guangzhou. Barac provokes Beggar So to kill Wong and Lin as they hinder his opium business. When So finally resolves his misunderstanding with Wong, he decides to join Wong to defeat Barac and stop the opium import.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddys lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Ultimate Malevolence
programme.desc: The final chapter of 'Tales From The Occult', the movie features three short stories about two high school friends, a magician undergoing hypnosis to find her missing friend, and a man finding his way out of a mysterious building. The stories reveal the most terrifying and ugly side of human nature, where life and death are just a thought away!

programme.title: Fight Back to School
programme.desc: The number one killer in SDU, Chow Sing Sing(Stephen Chow), is sent to a school to find a lost gun. His partner Tat(Ng Man Tat) pretends to be a school worker in assisting him. They recognize that some students are being closed with Fei, the head of triad society, and Fei traffics munitions. Sing steals and ignites Fei's munitions; Fei pledges to kill Sing...

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: Tainted Love
programme.desc: Office lady Zhou Ran falls victim to an online dating love scam and is cheated of 550,000 yuan. Following faint clues left by the scammer, Zhou Ran comes to a small coastal town and encounters two young men. She gradually discovers that these two men have hidden the clues of the scam, and sets out on her revenge plan.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile Hand of God to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the Hand of God?

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the teams downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the clubs top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men 2
programme.desc: Continuing from Ah Boys to Men, Ken returns to barracks, determined to change because of his bedridden father, and becomes a model recruit. However, his comrades think Ken wants to flatter and show off only, and repel him. Although Ken wants to explain, misunderstanding gets deepen through days. Can they unite and overcome the challenge together?

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Imprisoned 2: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: Hong Kong businessman Yu and his secretary travel abroad for business meetings. When the secretary is killed in their hotel, Yu is arrested. Despite pleading not guilty, Yu is imprisoned in a cruel multinational prison where the warden enjoys torturing prisoners, and he must find a way to escape from this dark and deadly prison to survive.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: An ordinary, cheerful and kind-hearted girl Bao, meets a troubled rich guy Edward by chance one summer. To ruin his fathers remarriage plans, Edward hires Bao and her friend to sabotage the wedding and that is how Bao and Edward meet and fall in love. All seems well for the sweet couple until their love quickly takes an unexpected turn

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels. Featuring two of the leading action stars of the era, Chen Kuen-tai and Lo Lieh, in a series of intense poker game standoffs. Famed director of the genre, Wong Jing, also has a guest appearance as one of the Notorious Eight.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiance suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiance accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Mings guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: The Thundering Sword
programme.desc: Two disciples, Yu and Zheng, are sent by their master to track down the invincible weapon Thundering Sword to prevent villains from getting it. Yu encounters the daughter of a ruthless clan, Chiao, who is on her way to seek for the sword. They quickly fall for each other, but when Chiao accidentally injures Zheng, things become complicated.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gangs leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from Nine Yang Scriptures by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai. The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific. Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Lius disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Murderer Pursues
programme.desc: Wang Chung was a valued actor long before he became a director, but as a filmmaker, he helped create some of the most interesting thrillers Shaw Brothers ever released - including this fascinating crime saga of a Sino-Vietnamese crime gang. Danny Lee stars as a misunderstood refugee while Ray Lui plays a cop struggling against his own conscience to ensure that justice is upheld.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji; and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brothers Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: Skilled shadow Tai Chi boxer Ku Ting hides his skills by working as a construction worker. However, when the thugs assaulted his girlfriend, Ku Ting has no choice but to use his kung fu to show his enemies what it takes to keep justice in line.

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Josh Brolin plays Jonah Hex, a scarred drifter and bounty hunter who can track down anyone...and anything. Having survived death, Jonah's violent history is steeped in myth and legend - leaving him with one foot in the natural world and one on the "other side." His only human connection is with Lilah (Transformers' Megan Fox), whose life in a brothel has left her with scars of her own. But Jonah's past is about to catch up with him when the U.S. military makes him an offer he can't refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must track down and stop the dangerous terrorist Quentin Turnbull (Oscar nominee John Malkovich). But Turnbull, who is gathering an army and preparing to unleash Hell, is also Jonah's oldest enemy and will stop at nothing until Jonah is dead. Based on the legendary graphic novel, this epic adventure thriller gives a new face to the comic book genre by combining the Western genre with supernatural elements.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: What if, in the wake of more than a decade of devastating weather events, we finally found a way to control Mother Nature and the destruction her tirades entail? When catastrophic climate change endangers Earths very survival, world governments unite and create Project Dutch Boy: a global net of satellites surrounding the planet that are armed with geo-engineering technologies designed to stave off the natural disasters. After successfully protecting the planet for two years, something is starting to go wrong. Two estranged brothers (Gerard Butler, Jim Sturgess) are tasked with solving the programs malfunction before a worldwide geostorm can engulf the planet.

programme.desc: I Meant Too Strong - Yuji and his party keep searching for the Earth Dragon. When they enter the Delight Canyon, the dragon suddenly appears!

programme.title: My Isekai Life: I Gained A Second Character Class And Became The Strongest Sage In The World! Ep4
programme.desc: Truly Unusual Situations - Yuji enters the forest with slimes and Proud Wolf at night before the dragon slayer corps start their morning attack.

programme.title: My Isekai Life: I Gained A Second Character Class And Became The Strongest Sage In The World! Ep5
programme.desc: That Cold Looked Troubling - Ricardo is facing a cold weather snap and is short of firewood. Yuji helps to procure firewood for a local restaurant.

programme.title: My Isekai Life: I Gained A Second Character Class And Became The Strongest Sage In The World! Ep6
programme.desc: Infiltrating An Ominous Village - An entrance to the underground appears in the forest. Under the ground are some big machines and strange men.

programme.title: My Isekai Life: I Gained A Second Character Class And Became The Strongest Sage In The World! Ep7
programme.desc: Assassins In Pursuit - Yuji travels to a town known for its monster armor, Boginia and visits a store opened by a skilful craftsman.

programme.title: Gintama Season 2 Ep77
programme.desc: Yesterday's Enemy Is Also Today's Enemy - Kyuubei announces she'll marry Otae. Shinpachi sneaks into Yagyuu's house with Gintoki and others to rescue his sister.

programme.title: Gintama Season 2 Ep78
programme.desc: A Person Who's Picky With Food Is Also Picky With Humans - Okita and Kagura are fighting against Nishino, one of the 4 Devas. But both of them can`t cooperate and are hurt.

programme.title: Gintama Season 2 Ep79
programme.desc: If There's Four People, It Is A Lot Of Knowledge - Kondo and Gintoki are having troubles in the toilet! They don`t have any toilet paper, and they are like trapped rats.

programme.title: Gintama Season 2 Ep80
programme.desc: A Person That Wears Glasses Suddenly Takes The Glasses Off, It Feels Like Something Is Missing. Like The Part Of The Person Is Missing - The battle between Gintoki and Binbokusai finally starts! Gintoki is struggling with Binbokusai's flexible movement.

programme.title: Haikyu!! 4th Season Ep21
programme.desc: Hero - Struggling with Atsumu's serve and Suna's quick move, Karasuno throws in the pinch server Kinoshita in the third set.

programme.title: Haikyu!! 4th Season Ep22
programme.desc: Pitons - Because of Atsumu's devoted setup, Inarizaki regains its momentum. Suddenly, someone's play has changed the game flow.

programme.title: Haikyu!! 4th Season Ep23
programme.desc: The Birth Of The Serene King - In the battle of nerves in the third set, Karasuno finally gets the match points and Kageyama shows his technique.

programme.title: Haikyu!! 4th Season Ep24
programme.desc: Monster's Ball - With one more point, the victor of the match will be decided. The battle between Karasuno and Inarizaki is fierce.

programme.title: Re: Zero -Starting Life In Another World- Season 2 Ep21

programme.title: Re: Zero -Starting Life In Another World- Season 2 Ep22
programme.desc: Happiness Reflected On The Water's Surface - While Roswaal's mansion is under siege, Subaru tries to convince Beatrice to break the contract and leave the library.

programme.title: Re: Zero -Starting Life In Another World- Season 2 Ep23
programme.desc: Love Me Down To My Blood And Guts - As the siege rages on, Subaru splits ways with Petra and Otto, going back into the burning mansion to save Beatrice.

programme.title: Re: Zero -Starting Life In Another World- Season 2 Ep24
programme.desc: Choose Me - Upon clearing her last trial, Emilia is greeted by the village people outside the Graveyard in a raging snowstorm.

programme.title: Re: Zero -Starting Life In Another World- Season 2 Ep25
programme.desc: Offbeat Steps Under The Moonlight - Under attack by countless Great Rabbits, Subaru needs to work with Beatrice and Emilia to protect the villagers.

programme.desc: Best Of Animax

programme.title: Kuroko's Basketball Ep7

programme.desc: Choice Of Betrayal - Lugh receives a request of assassinating Dia. Surprisingly, the client is Dia's father and Cian's friend, Count Viekone.

programme.title: Accused Ep7
programme.desc: Brenda's Story - When an acerbic female stand-up comic reports she was sexually assaulted at her friend's party, the DA decides her highly questionable past, and reputation obfuscates a conviction and drops all charges against the suspect. Enraged, the comedian uses her platform to try the case in the court of public opinion.

programme.title: Hope Springs
programme.desc: Arnold and Kay have been married for 30 years, and have drifted apart. To save their marriage, they attend an intense, week-long counseling session to work on their relationship.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S11 Ep142
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S11 Ep107
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S2 Ep1
programme.desc: A Next Level Welcome - Contestants begin their journey and look to make their first impressions in their respective teams.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Party Like A Guac Star - The chefs each prepare a dish from Mexico; one contestant is eliminated.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S2 Ep3
programme.desc: No Pain No Grain - The chefs are challenged with making an upscale sandwich; one chef is eliminated.

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: Raised by gorillas in a remote part of Africa, Tarzan must protect his jungle and Jane from greedy New York City businessmen who want to destroy his jungle home for profit in this stunning CGI-animated family adventure.

programme.title: The Good Fight S3 Ep1
programme.desc: The One About The Recent Troubles - A storm is brewing at Reddick, Boseman & Lockhart when revelations of past indiscretions involving a partner come to light.Right when she thought the world couldnt get any crazier, an incident at home pushes Diane to her breaking point.

programme.title: The Good Fight S3 Ep2
programme.desc: The One Inspired By Roy Cohn - Corruption incarnate enters the courtroom in the form of attorney Roland Blum (Michael Sheen), Maias new co-counsel on a murder trial. The firm interviews a potential new head of matrimonial law, but Lucca is skeptical of his qualifications.

programme.title: The Good Fight S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The One Where Diane Joins The Resistance - Diane is encouraged to do something after meeting the leader of a female resistance group whose aim is to sink POTUS approval rating. Maia and Blums plan for a plea deal goes awry when Assistant States Attorney Spencer Zschau takes the case.

programme.title: The Good Fight S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The One With Lucca Becoming A Meme - Luccas involvement in a viral mothering while black video sparks conversations at Reddick, Boseman & Lockhart that unearth racial biases and pay disparity at the firm. Liz joins Diane at a resistance group meeting.

programme.title: The Good Fight S3 Ep5
programme.desc: The One Where A Nazi Gets Punched - Blum weasels his way to a co-counsel seat on Reddick, Boseman & Lockharts largest case against genetics testing company Second Helix. While volunteering in the suburbs of Chicago, Lucca and Jay come face to face with an alt-right group.

programme.title: The Good Fight S3 Ep6
programme.desc: The One With The Celebrity Divorce - Celebrity hairdresser Wade V seeks Luccas help with a postnuptial agreement for a high profile client. Following the deal with Second Helix, Blum makes his presence well known at Reddick, Boseman & Lockhart, rattling some partners more than others.

programme.title: The Good Fight S3 Ep7
programme.desc: The One Where Diane And Liz Topple Democracy - Diane and Liz deal with a close ally when assigned to a class action case involving malfunctioning voting machines in the 2016 presidential election. Blums domineering tactics continue to push buttons at the firm.

programme.title: The Good Fight S3 Ep8
programme.desc: The One Where Kurt Saves Diane - Felix Staples (John Cameron Mitchell) rattles the firm when he returns with a case against ChumHum, bringing along a familiar face as his representation, Solomon Waltzer (Alan Alda).

programme.title: The Good Fight S3 Ep9
programme.desc: The One Where The Sun Comes Out - Reddick, Boseman & Lockhart is asked by ChumHum to bring on a specialist, lawyer Brenda DeCarlo (Cheryl Hines), to investigate any remaining misconduct or cultural issues within the firm. Diane begins to question the resistance groups tactics.

programme.title: The Good Fight S3 Ep10
programme.desc: The One About The End Of The World - Blum is out for revenge when he represents a group of Reddick, Boseman & Lockharts ex-clients who claim the firm overcharged them. When Lucca finds out shes a candidate for an open partner position, she begins to question her reputation.

programme.title: Bad Influence
programme.desc: A single mom is overjoyed when her daughter finally makes friends at her new high school. Soon, however, it becomes clear that this group of students follows their own moral code thats strange, self-centered, and possibly dangerous.

programme.title: I Don't Know How She Does It
programme.desc: Kate Reddy (Sarah Jessica Parker) manages the ultimate balancing act between work and her adoring family in this comedy based on the bestseller by Allison Pearson.

programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: A recent college graduate takes on a nannying job in a snobby New York penthouse that requires more parenting than she could have ever imagined.

programme.title: The Switch
programme.desc: Jennifer Aniston and Jason Bateman star in a charming, offbeat romantic comedy about best friends who accidentally become closer than they ever expected when one of them decides to have a baby.

programme.desc: A crash landing leaves teenager Kitai Raige (Jaden Smith) and his legendary father Cypher (Will Smith) stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after cataclysmic events forced humanitys escape.

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: A convicted thief poses as a cop in order to retrieve a stolen diamond.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson has been framed for a fire on The Pearl. A wanted man on the run, Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who is trapped inside the building...above the fire line.

programme.desc: A newly-single yuppie's new roommate acquires more than just a room. Stylish, adrenaline-laced thriller stars Bridget Fonda and Jennifer Jason Leigh.

programme.desc: Hunted by a ruthless agent and an army of corrupt cops working for a deadly drug kingpin, Toretto and OConner reunite the gang to pull off one last job - an insane heist worth $100 million!

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: When a Russian Military Convoy is taken down in Moscow, Agent Hobbs goes to the only man who can help him find his target Dominic Toretto.

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft with no idea who they are, how long they've been asleep, or what their mission is. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser and an all-star cast reunite in this action-packed adventure where an accursed mummy is resurrected -- along with a force even more powerful: The Scorpion King (The Rock).

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb Of The Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The OConnells must combat their deadliest enemy yet: a resurrected Emperor and his legion of 10,000 warriors, woken from a 2,000 year-old curse and hungry for brutal world domination.

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: Ethan and Lena meet and fall in love, and together, they uncover dark secrets about their respective families, their history, and their town in this supernatural romance thriller.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Discover how the sandwich staple Wonderbread is made; how nutty pecans are transformed into sugary rich pralines; how to make a perfectly balanced Morroccan harira vegan soup; and how stainless steel plates ensure the most crystal clear bagged ice!

programme.title: Whale with Steve Backshall S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Steve Backshall explores the evolving understanding of whales, how much they have in common with humans, and how recent discoveries could help to better protect them from threats in an increasingly changing world.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Lift - Hannah goes behind the scenes to look at the technology behind the lift, entering a 246m high lift shaft to test everything from the brakes to her own fear of heights.

programme.desc: Stuffed Pasta - Gregg Wallace explores the Dell Ugo factory in Hertfordshire to reveal how it makes 500 million stuffed pasta parcels annually. He's following the production of crab and crayfish raviolo, one of their best sellers.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Thailand - Ben travels to Thailand to meet Paul and Sao, who he first visited in Cambodia. Paul and his family have build their version of an English castle.
